JobFullDesc:
In alignment with the Nike brand vision, our NA Integrated Media (IM) Team strives every day to Connect & Engage Athletes* with compelling stories that encourages & enables them to make sport a daily habit. With the digital & paid media landscape evolving rapidly, it is an exciting time to be a part of our team. As part of the North America Brand Marketing organization, our team works x-functionally to activate marketing campaigns and programs that will help to propel the brand and the business into the future. The team will lead all aspects of planning and executing full funnel paid media campaigns, across the country, that encourage consumers to love sport and become athletes*. Collaborating with major media partners & agencies to develop innovative, industry-leading media plans that drive awareness and build interest for Nike’s stores, most important products, services & experiences. Effectively cutting through “the noise” to build impact. At scale.
WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR?
We’re looking for an experienced paid media manager who is passionate about driving an outstanding Online-to-Offline (O2O) media program here at Nike! The ideal candidate has a love for all things paid media and strong understanding of full funnel media and O2O consumer journeys. This person will be proficient in the art and science of media planning, buying, and reporting. We encourage a stead-fast curiosity that is quenched by geeking out over data & analysis, and a drive for implementing a test and learn approach. The ability to showcase how campaigns deliver against primary brand and business goals to peers and senior leaders alike is crucial. At Nike, we are looking for a self-starter, a standout colleague, and someone adept at pushing the bounds of media innovation and creative exploration.
WHAT WILL YOU WORK ON?
The NA Store Media Manager will work with the IM team to help bring stores campaign storytelling to life across the NA marketplace. You will lead, develop, and execute media campaigns aligned with Nike’s marketing vision, and critical success metrics. This role will partner with a variety of internal and external stake-holders and will use consumer insights and data to guide stores media campaign strategy and planning. As a team we bring best-in-class, innovative media plans to life. You will demonstrate your diverse media background, experience, and expertise to optimize campaigns “in the moment.” Develop significant findings to counsel and influence longer term stores campaign planning and execution.
WHO WILL YOU WORK WITH?
This role reports into the NA Director of Media, Cities & Stores. We will collaborate and partner with the broader IM team and numerous cross functional teams in the geography. Such as: Nike Stores business teams, creative, city marketing, Nike Direct Digital Commerce, wholesale, consumer insights, data science, and finance. You will pilot and run multiple relationships with key internal stake-holders, agency partners, and external media and platform partners.
